com.test.login.controller

Class ExpenseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.test.login.controller.ExpenseController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/expense")
public class ExpenseController
extends Object
    ExpenseController is a controller to create Expense and return all Expenses APIs from Expense Master that is called by URL starting with "/expense"
    Since:
    2019-11-07
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Anita Devdare

      ExpenseDtoResp allExpences()
      Retrieves all expenses from the database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/allexpences) through the get method
      ExpenseResponseDto deleteExpense(long eId)
      delete the expense from the Database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/delete{eid}) through the post method
      ExpenseDtoResp findByUserExpenses(long uId)
      Get the expense from the Database by user Id url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/getexpensebyuser/{uId}) through the get method

      Get the expense from the Database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/getexpense/{eId}) through the get method

      Registers the expense to be saved to the Database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/save) through the post method
      ExpenseResponseDto updateExpense(@Valid Expense expense, long eId)
      Update the expense to be saved to the Database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/update/{eId}) through the post method

      • saveExpense

        @PostMapping(path="/save",
             consumes="application/json")
public ExpenseResponseDto saveExpense(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                             @Valid Expense expense)
        Registers the expense to be saved to the Database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/save) through the post method
        Parameters:
        expense - object all details of expense in json format
        Returns:
        return the the saved expense object as a response

      • allExpences

        @GetMapping(path="/allexpences")
public ExpenseDtoResp allExpences()
        Retrieves all expenses from the database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/allexpences) through the get method
        Returns:
        all expenses details with expenses total in the json format

      • updateExpense

        @PutMapping(path="/update/{eId}",
            consumes="application/json")
public ExpenseResponseDto updateExpense(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                     @Valid Expense expense,
                                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                                     long eId)
        Update the expense to be saved to the Database url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/update/{eId}) through the post method
        Parameters:
        expense - object all details of expense in json format eId expense Id for updating the expense
        Returns:
        return the updated expense object as a response

                                                                              long eId)

        Parameters:
        eId - expense id for deleting the expense from the database
        Returns:
        return the expense object has been

public ExpenseResponseDto getExpenseById(@PathVariable

      • findByUserExpenses

        @GetMapping(path="/getexpensebyuser/{uId}")
public ExpenseDtoResp findByUserExpenses(@PathVariable
                                                                                      long uId)
        Get the expense from the Database by user Id url an absolute URL giving the base location of the expenses(http://localhost:8082/expense/getexpensebyuser/{uId}) through the get method
        Parameters:
        uId - getting List of expenses as per user Id from the database
        Returns:
        return List of expenses as per user Id from the database as a response
